scripts.build: cargo build --release && cp target/release/libaic_sdk_node.so index.node 2>/dev/null || cp target/release/libaic_sdk_node.dylib index.node 2>/dev/null || cp target/release/aic_sdk_node.dll index.node 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.debug: cargo build && cp target/debug/libaic_sdk_node.so index.node 2>/dev/null || cp target/debug/libaic_sdk_node.dylib index.node 2>/dev/null || cp target/debug/aic_sdk_node.dll index.node 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Use GitHub Actions to publish. See PUBLISHING.md for details.' && exit 1
